snippet.title: UNDERTALE: Bits and Pieces Mod - UnderEvent 2021 Trailer
snippet.description:
Here's our video segment from "UnderEvent," , a Nintendo Direct styled presentation featuring UNDERTALE fan games and other projects, meant to celebrate the creative talents of this community! Our trailer is styled after a traditional UNDERTALE release trailer, but featuring brand new Bits and Pieces content!


Check out our latest GameJolt devlog! https://gamejolt.com/p/undertale-bits-and-pieces-in-underevent-gcxbp7up
Watch the full UnderEvent 2021 video here! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aOadit6diGE


Trailer edited by Mr. Luwigi and themistake
UNDERTALE Bits and Pieces by Team!BnP
UNDERTALE by Toby Fox


The UNDERTALE Bits and Pieces mod hopes to retell the story of Man and Monster, fresh and filled with tons of changes and additions for a fully reimagined experience. With a complete visual overhaul, on top of adding back in unused content, new secrets, new features, attention to detail changes and more, all designed to be canon-compliant, there's plenty to revisit and do. Being based on the Nintendo Switch version, this mod also adds in the exclusive content from there, such as Mad Mew Mew, borders, and all that! Experience a new take on the beloved 6 year old game with one of the most ambitious Undertale™ mods out there, and we hope you stay tuned for more updates!

Our Socials:
GameJolt - https://gamejolt.com/games/UndertaleBnP/574044
Twitter - https://twitter.com/BlaizeMayes
Discord - https://discord.gg/33MFaRduCb
SoundCloud - https://soundcloud.com/undertale-bnp
Reddit - https://www.reddit.com/user/BlaizedotMayes/
